programme.title: Arab-Israeli peace deal collapses, March 1975
programme.short_synopsis: Arab-Israeli peace deal fails. King Faisal shot. Cambodia collapses.
programme.medium_synopsis: Arab-Israeli peace deal fails. King Faisal shot. Cambodia collapses. Kissinger's diplomatic efforts all end in failure.
programme.long_synopsis:
Arab-Israeli peace deal fails. King Faisal shot. Cambodia collapses. Kissinger's diplomatic efforts all end in failure.

The sound quality on this recording is variable/poor.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
